Flub.Name: Global
Flub.Description: Creates a sea even inside the terrain.

Flub.Name: Surrounding
Flub.Description: Create a sea surface from the edges of the terrain, but not inside the terrain.

Flub.Name: Level
Flub.Description: The water level in the sea.

Flub.Name: Coastal Erosion
Flub.Description: Perform erosion on the coastal areas.

Flub.Name: Shore Size
Flub.Description: The size of the shore created with coastal erosion.

Flub.Name: Shore Height
Flub.Description: The height of the shore created with coastal erosion.

Flub.Name: Variation
Flub.Description: The amount of variation on the coast.

Flub.Name: Extra Cliff Details
Flub.Description: Add extra details to the cliff on the terrain.

Flub.Name: Render water surface
Flub.Description: Renders the water surface in the sea area.
